Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Agent provides a couple of static methods for a game to compute a best move or find a legal full path between two given locations and so on.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Agent.HardLevel
      An enum representing the game level.
      static class  Agent.SearchResult
      This class represent a collection of infomation about a search result.

    • Method Detail

      • setHardLevel

        public static void setHardLevel(Agent.HardLevel level)
        Set the game level.
        Parameters:
        level - how hard the game is. Could be BEGINNER, EASY, ADVANCED or HARD.

      • goalTest

        public static boolean goalTest(CBStatus state,
               CheckerStatus color)
        Return true if the checkerboard status represents a goal for the color, false otherwise. A goal means either the opponent has no legal move or no checkers at all.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the current status of the checkerboard.
        color - the color of checkers owned by the player.
        Returns:
        true if the checkerboard status represents a goal for the color, false otherwise.

      • bestMove

        public static Agent.SearchResult bestMove(CBStatus state,
                          CheckerStatus rep)
        Compute and return a best move for the given player based on the given checkerboard status.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the current status of the checkerboard.
        rep - the color of checkers owned by the player.
        Returns:
        a best move for the given player based on the given checkerboard status.

      • maxValue

        private static Agent.SearchResult maxValue(CBStatus state,
                          int alpha,
                          int beta,
                          int depth)
        Compute and return the value of the best choice for the current player found in the search tree rooted in the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the current status of the checkerboard.
        alpha - the value of the best choice found so far at any choice point along the path for MAX.
        beta - the value of the best choice found so far at any choice point along the path for MIN.
        depth - the depth at which this procedure is called.
        Returns:
        the value of the best choice for the current player found in the search tree rooted in the given state.

      • minValue

        private static Agent.SearchResult minValue(CBStatus state,
                          int alpha,
                          int beta,
                          int depth)
        Compute and return the value of the best choice for the opponent found in the search tree rooted in the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        alpha - the value of the best choice found so far at any choice point along the path for MAX.
        beta - the value of the best choice found so far at any choice point along the path for MIN.
        depth - the depth at which this procedure is called.
        Returns:
        the value of the best choice for the current found in the search tree rooted in the given state.

      • cutoffTest

        private static boolean cutoffTest(CBStatus state,
                 int depth)
        Test and return true if the given checkerboard status represents a goal of the current player or it reaches to the cutoff level in a search, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        depth - the depth at which this procedure is called.
        Returns:
        true if the given checkerboard status represents a goal of the current player or it reaches to the cutoff level in a search, false otherwise.

      • evaluate

        private static int evaluate(CBStatus state)
        Compute and return the value of the given state for the current player. If the state is a goal state for the current player, it returns a MAX value (1000). If the state is a goal state for the opponent player, it returns a MIN value (-1000). Otherwise, it returns an estimated value resulted as a weighted sum based on
        -- the difference of numbers of chesses currently owned by the two players.
        -- the difference of numbers of possible moves can be taken by the two players.
        -- the difference of numbers of possible jumps can be taken by the two players.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        Returns:
        the value of the given state for the current player.

      • findPath

        public static Action findPath(CBStatus state,
              Location from,
              Location to)
        Find and return the full path starting at from and go next to to. Extensive path may be availabe if it takes a jump and more jumps are availbe from to.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        from - the location to start with.
        to - the immediate next location targeted.
        Returns:
        a full path starting at from and go next to to.

      • makeAMove

        private static void makeAMove(CBStatus state,
             Step step)
        Compute the successor state by taking an action of step on state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        step - a single step to be taken.

      • isMovable

        private static boolean isMovable(CBStatus state,
                Location from)
        Return true if there is any possible move/jump can be made starting at from, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if there is any possible move/jump can be made starting at from, false otherwise.

      • possibleJumps

        private static Action possibleJumps(CBStatus state,
                   Location from)
        Compute and return all possible jumps starting at from in the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        from - the location to start with.
        Returns:
        all possible jumps starting at from in the given state.

      • possibleMoves

        private static Action possibleMoves(CBStatus state,
                   Location from)
        Compute and return all possible moves starting at from in the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        from - the location to start with.
        Returns:
        all possible moves starting at from in the given state.

      • moveTo

        private static HowToMove moveTo(CBStatus state,
               Location from,
               Location to)
        Compute and return how to move from from to to.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        from - the location to start with.
        to - the immediate next location targeted.
        Returns:
        how to move from from to to. Either NONE, MOVE or JUMP.

      • possibleActions

        private static Action possibleActions(CBStatus state,
                     CheckerStatus rep)
        Compute and return all possible actions can be made by rep in the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - a matrix of CheckerStatus representing the opponent status of the checkerboard.
        rep - checker status representing the player.
        Returns:
        all possible actions can be made by rep in the given state.
